issue.title: Valkyrie Drops to the Ground due to incorrect delays in startup script

content.raw: Ah, totally missed that message when I was scanning through the output you posted. Roughly how far did you manually lower Val? If you released just as the feet hit the ground the controller may not have detected contact and thus wouldn't switch to "walking" mode. You should wait to see the knees bend a bit, then send a HighLevelStateRosMessage to change to "walking", and then detach the harness.
